LABEL: 0x133
STRING: 【Door opening.】

LABEL: 0x153
STRING: Following the announcement, we boarded the elevator.

LABEL: 0x18B
STRING: All that was left was to go down to the second floor...

LABEL: 0x22A
STRING: Something suddenly felt off.

LABEL: 0x248
STRING: It was easy to tell what it was.

LABEL: 0x276
STRING: The touch panel button.

LABEL: 0x29C
STRING: I hadn't noticed it until now, but there was a strange blank space under the floor display light.

LABEL: 0x2EA
STRING: Could it be――

LABEL: 0x302
STRING: 「Wait a second, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x33B
STRING: 「Eh?」

LABEL: 0x358
STRING: With that thought in mind, I held up the master key to the bottom of the touch panel.

LABEL: 0x3A2
STRING: If my hunch was correct...

LABEL: 0x3F3
STRING: 「All right!」

LABEL: 0x40B
STRING: A light electronic sound.

LABEL: 0x427
STRING: It was just as I thought...

LABEL: 0x447
STRING: Before long, a new number appeared at the bottom of the panel.

LABEL: 0x54E
STRING: 「What's this?!」

LABEL: 0x5CC
STRING: 「What did you do, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x5F7
STRING: 「Well, I just tried something out.」

LABEL: 0x633
STRING: 「I can't believe there are actually more buttons to this...」

LABEL: 0x661
STRING: Most likely, it was a place only a select few with the proper authority could go.

LABEL: 0x6AD
STRING: But, this display...

LABEL: 0x6DE
STRING: 「...It's underground, right?」

LABEL: 0x707
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x73D
STRING: Saying that it was "underground" was strange, seeing that we were in a submarine.

LABEL: 0x775
STRING: The display showed "B1," which usually indicated floors below ground.

LABEL: 0x814
STRING: I didn't know what was happening on the lower floors...

LABEL: 0x850
STRING: I was a little curious, but there was nothing I could do about it now.

LABEL: 0x88E
STRING: Besides, I didn't want to take Touri somewhere I didn't know about.

LABEL: 0x8E9
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x967
STRING: 「Oh, sorry, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x985
STRING: Touri's voice brought me back to reality.

LABEL: 0x9AD
STRING: How much time were we taking going down just one floor?

LABEL: 0x9FF
STRING: I pressed the button for the second floor.

LABEL: 0xA25
STRING: The door closed, and the elevator began to move.

LABEL: 0xA68
STRING: 「Are we not going underground?」

LABEL: 0xA9B
STRING: 「There's no point in going now, I think.」

LABEL: 0xAC9
STRING: 「I'll talk to Hiragino about it later.」

LABEL: 0xC70
STRING: 「Huh――」

LABEL: 0xC97
STRING: 「Wh-What?!」

LABEL: 0xCBA
STRING: We were enveloped in darkness suddenly.

LABEL: 0xCD4
STRING: As if shut down, the sound of the elevator stopped as well.

LABEL: 0xD12
STRING: It was like we had been thrown into outer space without any warning.

LABEL: 0xD65
STRING: 「Ah, ah...」

LABEL: 0xD86
STRING: I heard Touri's voice.

LABEL: 0xD9E
STRING: A moment later, there was pressure on my left arm.

LABEL: 0xE49
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...!」

LABEL: 0xE6C
STRING: 「I'm here...」

LABEL: 0xE86
STRING: Her voice was almost a whisper.

LABEL: 0xEB4
STRING: I could hear her breathing in my ear.

LABEL: 0xED8
STRING: I realized that Touri was clinging to my left arm.

LABEL: 0xF66
STRING: She squeezed my arm hard.

LABEL: 0xF90
STRING: Her body pressed against me even harder.

LABEL: 0xFBA
STRING: My body stiffened involuntarily.

LABEL: 0xFE6
STRING: ...The elevator showed no signs of moving again.

LABEL: 0x101E
STRING: To put it another way, there was no sign of the situation getting any worse from here.

LABEL: 0x1060
STRING: 「...A blackout, is it?」

LABEL: 0x109E
STRING: I let out a sigh.

LABEL: 0x10BA
STRING: The sooner we got out of here, the better, but it didn't look like we were under immediate threat.

LABEL: 0x1110
STRING: The timing was simply bad...

LABEL: 0x113E
STRING: Still, what perfect timing.

LABEL: 0x116E
STRING: A confined space, darkness, and silence.

LABEL: 0x1192
STRING: It made sense that she'd be upset after getting trapped like this without mentally preparing herself.

LABEL: 0x11D0
STRING: Calming Touri down as she squeezed my left arm came first...

LABEL: 0x1212
STRING: I fumblingly put my hand on her head.

LABEL: 0x12BD
STRING: 「Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x12DE
STRING: 「Are you okay?」

LABEL: 0x1373
STRING: 「Y-Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x13AC
STRING: Once, twice...

LABEL: 0x13CA
STRING: As I petted her repeatedly, her grip on me gradually weakened.

LABEL: 0x140C
STRING: The trembling transmitted to the palm of my hand was soon gone.

LABEL: 0x144A
STRING: After I felt her letting go of me, I gently stopped.

LABEL: 0x150B
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, what's happening...?」

LABEL: 0x1538
STRING: 「It's probably just a blackout.」

LABEL: 0x1564
STRING: 「It's nothing to worry about.」

LABEL: 0x1594
STRING: ――That being said...

LABEL: 0x15B8
STRING: I didn't think there were many things more terrifying than losing power on a sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x160A
STRING: However, it was true that this was not a problem that could be dealt with by panicking.

LABEL: 0x16C5
STRING: 「A blackout...」

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: 「Oh! Can't POL do something about this?」

LABEL: 0x178F
STRING: 「It's true that POL should be installed in the elevator as well...」

LABEL: 0x17E5
STRING: 「POL! P-O-L!」

LABEL: 0x185B
STRING: 「POOL

LABEL: 0x1921
STRING: POPOPOL!?」

LABEL: 0x194D
STRING: 「What's that supposed to be?」

LABEL: 0x1987
STRING: Touri's efforts were in vain, and there was no response.

LABEL: 0x19B9
STRING: Of course, if the power was out, even POL should be useless... to a certain extent.

LABEL: 0x1A08
STRING: Consolidating all lifelines into one circuit was a half-century-old fad.

LABEL: 0x1A5A
STRING: Now that the importance of risk hedging had been recognized after several disasters,

LABEL: 0x1AA4
STRING: there was no such thing as a design that didn't have a power supply portfolio.

LABEL: 0x1B6B
STRING: 「There must be an emergency power source somewhere, right?」

LABEL: 0x1BA4
STRING: 「Emergency power, huh...」

LABEL: 0x1BC6
STRING: Touri was right.

LABEL: 0x1BE8
STRING: However, if the emergency power supply was functioning normally, it should be activated automatically.

LABEL: 0x1C48
STRING: Furthermore, in the event that there was no automatic switch, the manual switch was usually placed in an easy-to-reach place.

LABEL: 0x1CBC
STRING: And yet...

LABEL: 0x1D59
STRING: 「Where could it be... Hmm...」

LABEL: 0x1D86
STRING: I didn't see anything that looked like it.

LABEL: 0x1DB2
STRING: In the darkness, I reached for the touch panel that displayed the floor numbers, but there was no response.

LABEL: 0x1E10
STRING: On the contrary, not even a switch for external communication was to be found.

LABEL: 0x1E6E
STRING: ――Wasn't this situation more serious than I thought?

LABEL: 0x1EAC
STRING: With the connection to the outside completely severed, there was nothing we could do.

LABEL: 0x1EFC
STRING: At this rate...

LABEL: 0x1F1E
STRING: A chill ran down my spine when I imagined the worst-case scenario.

LABEL: 0x1FBF
STRING: 「Hmm.」

LABEL: 0x1FD7
STRING: 「It's no use.」

LABEL: 0x1FF9
STRING: 「We'll just have to wait for the others to do something about it.」

LABEL: 0x2056
STRING: Touri, whose imagination hadn't reached that point yet, sighed optimistically.

LABEL: 0x209C
STRING: Come to think of it...

LABEL: 0x20B8
STRING: At some point, she had calmed down as if her initial fear of the blackout had never happened.

LABEL: 0x2110
STRING: Once she realized she couldn't do anything, she readily accepted our current situation.

LABEL: 0x21D5
STRING: 「I know you're worried, Katagiri-san, but let's wait patiently.」

LABEL: 0x221C
STRING: 「Ah, yeah.」

LABEL: 0x2236
STRING: 「You're right. There's no point in panicking.」

LABEL: 0x2279
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x22FF
STRING: 「Hiragino-sensei is out there, so it'll be okay.」

LABEL: 0x2338
STRING: Honestly, I was grateful for her optimistic attitude right now.

LABEL: 0x238A
STRING: That's right.

LABEL: 0x23A0
STRING: Just as she said, Hiragino and Yukari were outside.

LABEL: 0x23D4
STRING: When push came to shove, even Tokiwa and Reiri could be relied on.

LABEL: 0x240C
STRING: I didn't know if the two of them would come to my rescue,

LABEL: 0x2444
STRING: but Tokiwa seemed to be on good terms with Touri, and even Reiri wouldn't abandon her own sister.

LABEL: 0x249C
STRING: If I'd been trapped by myself...

LABEL: 0x24EA
STRING: That'll just make me sad, so let's not think about it.

LABEL: 0x251F
STRING: 「Haa.」

LABEL: 0x253A
STRING: Touri let out a relaxed voice.

LABEL: 0x2562
STRING: It seemed like she had sat down.

LABEL: 0x2588
STRING: I sat down next to her without saying anything.

LABEL: 0x25BC
STRING: The touch of the cool floor felt so nice I almost forgot the urgency of our situation.

LABEL: 0x2619
STRING: 「It kind of feels like we're in a whale's stomach.」

LABEL: 0x2658
STRING: A whale...

LABEL: 0x2672
STRING: If we took gigantism as a characteristic of deep-sea life, the most obvious examples would be whales.

LABEL: 0x26CA
STRING: Some species, such as blue whales, the world's largest living creatures, were well known for the fact that they were mammals, not fish.

LABEL: 0x2764
STRING: Was it Pinocchio that went into a whale's stomach?

LABEL: 0x2798
STRING: I felt like I had read it when I was a kid, but I didn't remember anything besides his growing nose.

LABEL: 0x2861
STRING: 「Come to think of it...」

LABEL: 0x287D
STRING: 「Why is this ship a "sheep?"」

LABEL: 0x2915
STRING: 「Do you happen to know, Katagiri-san?」

LABEL: 0x294A
STRING: 「Ah, you see――」

LABEL: 0x29FB
STRING: 『Don't you know?』

LABEL: 0x2A19
STRING: 『All the sheep in the sea are whales.』

LABEL: 0x2AB5
STRING: ――I recalled a familiar voice at that moment.

LABEL: 0x2AE3
STRING: My sister sounded like she was having fun.

LABEL: 0x2B0D
STRING: She always seemed to be like that... I think.

LABEL: 0x2B4B
STRING: Had I just forgotten all about her, except how she looked like when she was having fun?

LABEL: 0x2B87
STRING: There must have been painful and sad things as well.

LABEL: 0x2BBD
STRING: I wanted to remember everything――

LABEL: 0x2BE1
STRING: But that would probably be too painful.

LABEL: 0x2C17
STRING: "Memories are always beautiful" was merely a nice saying.

LABEL: 0x2CD0
STRING: 「Well?」

LABEL: 0x2CEA
STRING: 「Come on, tell me!」

LABEL: 0x2D11
STRING: 「――Oh, sorry.」

LABEL: 0x2D39
STRING: 「<SHEEP> is an abbreviation for 『Seek for Hidden Ecosystem and Energy Property.』」

LABEL: 0x2E0E
STRING: 「...What?」

LABEL: 0x2E35
STRING: 「『Seek for Hidden Ecosystem and Energy Property.』」

LABEL: 0x2ED8
STRING: 「...One more time!」

LABEL: 0x2F02
STRING: 「『Seek for Hidden Ecosystem and Energy Property.』」

LABEL: 0x2FA5
STRING: 「Pardon?」

LABEL: 0x2FCD
STRING: 「『Seek for Hidden Ecosystem and Energy Property.』」

LABEL: 0x30BD
STRING: 「Ow, ow!」

LABEL: 0x30DD
STRING: A punch flew at me, accompanied by her groaning.

LABEL: 0x310F
STRING: Her aim was accurate despite the darkness.

LABEL: 0x31C8
STRING: 「Geez!」

LABEL: 0x31E0
STRING: 「You're pronouncing it so well on purpose, aren't you?!」

LABEL: 0x3215
STRING: 「Huh? Not really――」

LABEL: 0x324A
STRING: 「I can't understand a word!」

LABEL: 0x327F
STRING: Don't sound so proud about it...

LABEL: 0x32AF
STRING: 「...What's your English grade, Touri?」

LABEL: 0x3370
STRING: 「...A little under two, I guess.」

LABEL: 0x3394
STRING: What did she mean, "a little under?"

LABEL: 0x33B0
STRING: I hoped it was a five-level grading system, at least...

LABEL: 0x33E5
STRING: 「To put it in Japanese, it's something like "exploring unknown ecosystems and energy sources."」

LABEL: 0x3439
STRING: 「The "unknown ecosystems" part refers to the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0x347F
STRING: 「The <SHEEP> Project is a project that carries the hopes and dreams of the people of the world to the sea.」

LABEL: 0x34E8
STRING: ...Although that didn't sound like a name of a project that would be attached to a cruise submarine.

LABEL: 0x35D3
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x35F4
STRING: Touri listened intently.

LABEL: 0x361E
STRING: When I put it into words, it became terribly abstract.

LABEL: 0x3660
STRING: My sister taught me most of it...

LABEL: 0x368E
STRING: However, it seemed to have gotten through to Touri.

LABEL: 0x373F
STRING: 「So, the <SHEEP III> we're on is a "ship of hope," right?」

LABEL: 0x37F8
STRING: 「It's like Noah's Ark!」

LABEL: 0x3888
STRING: 「...Wait, huh?」

LABEL: 0x38A8
STRING: 「Was it Noah or Pandora...?」

LABEL: 0x38DB
STRING: Don't mix up the two.

LABEL: 0x38FF
STRING: I almost burst out laughing.

LABEL: 0x3931
STRING: Even though both were related to "boxes," Noah's Ark was from the Old Testament, and Pandora's Box was from Greek mythology.

LABEL: 0x3981
STRING: It all got messy when you started talking about the origin of flood myths...

LABEL: 0x39C1
STRING: Pandora had nothing to do with those.

LABEL: 0x39F1
STRING: 「The Ark was Noah's.」

LABEL: 0x3A35
STRING: I was sure likening the <SHEEP III> to Noah's Ark was correct.

LABEL: 0x3A76
STRING: Indeed, Noah's Ark was a ship that connected hope to the future.

LABEL: 0x3AAE
STRING: It was a ship that carried only a limited number of survivors.

LABEL: 0x3AF4
STRING: As for us, there were six survivors left, plus this "someone" who might be on the ship.

LABEL: 0x3B3A
STRING: ――It was an ominous analogy.

LABEL: 0x3B62
STRING: Of course, Touri probably didn't mean it that way...

LABEL: 0x3B9C
STRING: What had the Ark looked like to the people left behind, I wondered.

LABEL: 0x3C51
STRING: 「Hey.」

LABEL: 0x3C6C
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x3C97
STRING: 「The power isn't back on yet...」

LABEL: 0x3CCA
STRING: There was a hint of unease in her voice.

LABEL: 0x3CF6
STRING: I felt the same way.

LABEL: 0x3D26
STRING: I didn't think being unable to grasp what was happening outside would be this painful.

LABEL: 0x3D66
STRING: Our lack of a sense of time evoked a feeling of endlessness.

LABEL: 0x3DD8
STRING: ――Oh no!

LABEL: 0x3DF4
STRING: Touri began to sound increasingly hopeless.

LABEL: 0x3E1A
STRING: I hurriedly searched for the right words and topic to talk about.

LABEL: 0x3E46
STRING: 「B-By the way...」

LABEL: 0x3E66
STRING: 「You seem to be fine with dark places.」

LABEL: 0x3F0D
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x3F23
STRING: 「I'm used to the dark.」

LABEL: 0x3F54
STRING: It didn't seem like she was putting on a brave face.

LABEL: 0x3F92
STRING: She didn't sound like she was trying to reassure me. She must've been telling the truth.

LABEL: 0x4004
STRING: Come to think of it, I seemed to recall that before the accident, Touri had been looking for her sister in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x405E
STRING: Well, at the time I thought that Hikari was her little sister, not Reiri...

LABEL: 0x40B4
STRING: ――With that, I couldn't help but think about Hikari, and my thoughts drifted away.

LABEL: 0x4168
STRING: 「What do you mean you're used to it?」

LABEL: 0x4215
STRING: 「Um, well...」

LABEL: 0x429F
STRING: 「I used to live in the woods.」

LABEL: 0x42D9
STRING: 「And woods get dark at night...」

LABEL: 0x4305
STRING: 「I was always alone with Reiri in a small room, in the dark.」

LABEL: 0x4343
STRING: 「So I'm used to these, you know, kind of lonely times...」

LABEL: 0x43F9
STRING: 「...Ehehe.」

LABEL: 0x441A
STRING: As she explained, Touri laughed bashfully.

LABEL: 0x44CB
STRING: 「I was reminded of the past for some reason.」

LABEL: 0x4501
STRING: 「Sorry, it's a weird feeling...」

LABEL: 0x4536
STRING: Silence.

LABEL: 0x454A
STRING: A lukewarm awkwardness hung in the air.

LABEL: 0x458A
STRING: I tried to imagine the young sisters living in the woods.

LABEL: 0x45C8
STRING: I didn't really know anything about Touri, now that I thought about it.

LABEL: 0x4612
STRING: Why did this girl come here in the first place...?

LABEL: 0x4728
STRING: 「I boarded the <SHEEP III> with my sister, but I don't really know much about the sea myself.」

LABEL: 0x47FB
STRING: She had accompanied Reiri, that's all.

LABEL: 0x481F
STRING: ...Didn't she have a reason of her own?

LABEL: 0x4847
STRING: That's not it...

LABEL: 0x4863
STRING: Even if they were twins, the way she doted on Reiri was abnormal.

LABEL: 0x48AB
STRING: I felt a kind of dependence there.

LABEL: 0x493F
STRING: 「...Didn't your parents say anything?」

LABEL: 0x49EE
STRING: 「Well...」

LABEL: 0x4A76
STRING: 「I don't have a Mom or Dad.」

LABEL: 0x4AAF
STRING: 「Huh?」

LABEL: 0x4AC5
STRING: She doesn't have... so――

LABEL: 0x4AF8
STRING: 「Our Mom had an accident when we were little...」

LABEL: 0x4B2A
STRING: 「And I don't even know what our Dad looks like.」

LABEL: 0x4B57
STRING: 「Is that... so...」

LABEL: 0x4B79
STRING: 「I'm sorry for asking.」

LABEL: 0x4C1E
STRING: 「No, don't worry about it.」

LABEL: 0x4CB0
STRING: 「It was a long time ago, and even now, I'm not that lonely.」

LABEL: 0x4CF2
STRING: 「I'm not alone because Reiri's here, after all.」

LABEL: 0x4D27
STRING: 「Hmm.」

LABEL: 0x4D59
STRING: I didn't realize her parents had passed away...

LABEL: 0x4D83
STRING: Touri's confession was unexpected.

LABEL: 0x4DA5
STRING: That was probably where her obsession with Reiri came from.

LABEL: 0x4DE7
STRING: I thought the atmosphere would get awkward, but there was no sign of that happening.

LABEL: 0x4E21
STRING: To her, her parents seemed to be a problem that had been sorted out.

LABEL: 0x4E65
STRING: However, the fact that she had lost her mother in an accident...

LABEL: 0x4E99
STRING: It somehow overlapped with how I had suddenly lost my own sister one day.

LABEL: 0x4ED7
STRING: The memory of it was something I couldn't tell about to anyone.

LABEL: 0x4F0F
STRING: Not to anyone...

LABEL: 0x4F49
STRING: 「Hey, Touri.」

LABEL: 0x4FE0
STRING: 「What's up?」

LABEL: 0x4FFF
STRING: 「If you don't mind, could you tell me about your childhood?」

LABEL: 0x50C2
STRING: 「Fweh?」

LABEL: 0x50DF
STRING: She let out a strange voice.

LABEL: 0x50FF
STRING: It was as if she hadn't expected that at all.

LABEL: 0x5129
STRING: Did she think that it was insensitive for me to ask that right after telling me how she had lost her parents?

LABEL: 0x5229
STRING: Touri hesitated.

LABEL: 0x52C0
STRING: 「...Okay, sure.」

LABEL: 0x5350
STRING: 「But only since it's you, Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x5381
STRING: I could imagine her mischievous smile in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x53BB
STRING: And so, Touri began to talk.

LABEL: 0x5480
STRING: 「Like I said earlier, I don't know much about our Dad.」

LABEL: 0x54CA
STRING: 「By the time I could remember, I'd always lived with just our Mom and Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x5579
STRING: 「I've never even seen a picture of him... But...」

LABEL: 0x561D
STRING: 「Our Mom was a very cheerful person.」

LABEL: 0x5655
STRING: 「She was a bit airheaded and messed things up a lot, but she always had a smile on her face.」

LABEL: 0x570D
STRING: 「She was always there for me and Reiri, so I didn't feel lonely at all without a father.」

LABEL: 0x57E9
STRING: 「Even Reiri was more cheerful and energetic back then.」

LABEL: 0x582B
STRING: 「The three of us often went out together.」

LABEL: 0x5854
STRING: 「Every day, just the three of us.」

LABEL: 0x5877
STRING: 「Back then, I thought it was...」

LABEL: 0x589B
STRING: 「Really fun...」

LABEL: 0x58DE
STRING: I couldn't see her expression in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x5918
STRING: But from the way she spoke, it sounded like she was truly reminiscing about the past.

LABEL: 0x596E
STRING: Like she was missing those days and wanted to go back to those times.

LABEL: 0x59A7
STRING: 「――And yet...」

LABEL: 0x59C7
STRING: 「That day, everything changed.」

LABEL: 0x59F4
STRING: The faint trembling of her voice reached my ears.

LABEL: 0x5AA5
STRING: 「On the "Fourth Day"...」

LABEL: 0x5AC7
STRING: 「Our Mom died.」

LABEL: 0x5B31
STRING: 「Reiri almost died as well due to her serious injuries.」

LABEL: 0x5B71
STRING: 「She survived, but the aftereffects...」

LABEL: 0x5C15
STRING: 「We had no parents from then on and were taken in by the "House of Four Seasons."」

LABEL: 0x5C64
STRING: 「The House of Four Seasons... Is that some sort of an institution?」

LABEL: 0x5D05
STRING: 「Yeah, it is.」

LABEL: 0x5D25
STRING: 「I wouldn't call it an institution, but there were kids like us there.」

LABEL: 0x5D7C
STRING: 「So, are you two still living there?」

LABEL: 0x5E2D
STRING: 「Yeah. Before I knew it, I was like a caretaker for the little kids.」

LABEL: 0x5E80
STRING: Touri let out a little laugh.

LABEL: 0x5EBA
STRING: ..."The Fourth Day," huh...

LABEL: 0x5EDC
STRING: It reminded me of the artificial island that the <SHEEP III> had crossed before diving, the <Isle of Wind>.

LABEL: 0x5F25
STRING: Those white wind turbines were grave markers.

LABEL: 0x5F4B
STRING: 4th of April, 2026. "The Fourth Day."

LABEL: 0x5F77
STRING: They were tombstones for the many people who died on the Aqualine that day seven years ago...

LABEL: 0x6020
STRING: Kurama Bay Aqualine multiple collision accident.

LABEL: 0x605A
STRING: It had become a thing of the past now, but the commotion at the time was extraordinary.

LABEL: 0x60B4
STRING: Criticism against the government and corporations spread day after day on social media, and personally filmed videos filled the Internet.

LABEL: 0x611D
STRING: Sometimes I wanted to, but it was a tragedy we could never forget.

LABEL: 0x6165
STRING: Everyone in Japan knew about that accident. To think that she was one of the victims...

LABEL: 0x6212
STRING: Touri's reminiscence continued.

LABEL: 0x62AD
STRING: 「When we were taken in by the House of Four Seasons, Reiri and I were nine.」

LABEL: 0x62EC
STRING: 「At first, I was worried that I wouldn't fit in,

LABEL: 0x632C
STRING: but soon enough, I was having fun with everyone and enjoyed my daily life.」

LABEL: 0x63EE
STRING: 「Reiri's body became really weak after the accident, and she was often sick and bedridden.」

LABEL: 0x64B6
STRING: 「Eventually, she shut herself away and started reading books all the time.」

LABEL: 0x6508
STRING: 「Whether at school or at the house, she hardly ever talked to anyone other than me...」

LABEL: 0x6550
STRING: 「Even I...」

LABEL: 0x6570
STRING: 「Ever since then, even I've had no idea what she's thinking...」

LABEL: 0x65EF
STRING: Touri told me that Reiri had been bright as a child.

LABEL: 0x661B
STRING: It was hard to imagine it from her current appearance, but she must have been running and playing around with Touri in the past.

LABEL: 0x6678
STRING: The twins playing together.

LABEL: 0x6696
STRING: So, why――

LABEL: 0x66B8
STRING: 「Touri...」

LABEL: 0x674D
STRING: 「Ah, sorry! I got all gloomy there.」

LABEL: 0x6783
STRING: 「It's true that I feel a bit lonely because she doesn't open up to me.」

LABEL: 0x67D5
STRING: 「But, Reiri has always been a kind girl.」

LABEL: 0x6883
STRING: 「After all, it's thanks to her that I was able to come here.」

LABEL: 0x68CC
STRING: 「Thanks to her?」

LABEL: 0x68E6
STRING: Touri nodded.

LABEL: 0x6979
STRING: 「Reiri was involved in the <SHEEP III> project, apparently.」

LABEL: 0x69C2
STRING: 「I had no idea...」

LABEL: 0x69F4
STRING: 「But when I said that I wanted to ride a submarine one day...」

LABEL: 0x6AA6
STRING: 「She prepared a ticket for me, which surprised me.」

LABEL: 0x6AF3
STRING: 「By the <SHEEP III> project, do you mean that Reiri had something to do with ROMLES?」

LABEL: 0x6BC9
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x6BDF
STRING: 「Ever since coming to the House of Four Seasons, she had been helping out at ROMLES while neglecting sleep.」

LABEL: 0x6C52
STRING: 「Helping out ROMLES...」

LABEL: 0x6CEB
STRING: 「I don't know what she was doing, but she spent most of her time on it.」

LABEL: 0x6D49
STRING: 「She didn't sleep a wink on weekdays...」

LABEL: 0x6D79
STRING: 「Oh, but during the weekends, she slept like she was dead.」

LABEL: 0x6DB9
STRING: 「I wonder if the fact that our sleep schedules are so different is why we don't talk that much...」

LABEL: 0x6E2C
STRING: An irregular sleep schedule.

LABEL: 0x6E4E
STRING: A connection to ROMLES.

LABEL: 0x6E6E
STRING: There were a few things there that bothered me,

LABEL: 0x6E9E
STRING: but Touri let out a sigh as if she was tired from all the talking.

LABEL: 0x6EEE
STRING: I hesitated to delve any deeper than this...

LABEL: 0x6F24
STRING: She told me that Reiri had been involved with the <SHEEP III>,

LABEL: 0x6F67
STRING: but I wondered what exactly she had done.

LABEL: 0x7052
STRING: 「Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x706E
STRING: 「The power's not coming back at all.」

LABEL: 0x7097
STRING: 「You're right...」

LABEL: 0x70CD
STRING: We had been trapped here for almost twenty minutes.

LABEL: 0x70F9
STRING: The deep sea, power outages, repairs... I was getting worried.

LABEL: 0x712F
STRING: What the hell was going on?

LABEL: 0x7155
STRING: Speaking of elevators, even the one in the rear section, which was almost completely submerged, could be used.

LABEL: 0x71A9
STRING: Even though the surrounding equipment was almost unusable, surely from the wheelhouse――

LABEL: 0x726B
STRING: 「...The power system is linked to the emergency watertight doors, and it's independent from the elevator...」

LABEL: 0x72BF
STRING: 「...The control system was unprotected and could be operated... which means――」

LABEL: 0x7382
STRING: 「...That's right!」

LABEL: 0x7470
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x74AC
STRING: This elevator ran on independent power.

LABEL: 0x74E2
STRING: And it could be controlled from the wheelhouse.

LABEL: 0x7510
STRING: Nevertheless, it was strange that there had been no reaction at all.

LABEL: 0x7550
STRING: 「Why haven't they done anything...?」

LABEL: 0x7580
STRING: Various possibilities came to mind.

LABEL: 0x75AE
STRING: Maybe they hadn't noticed the elevator malfunctioning, which was impossible now that so much time had passed.

LABEL: 0x761C
STRING: Or...

LABEL: 0x7636
STRING: ――Whoever attacked Reiri was inside the ship.

LABEL: 0x766C
STRING: Don't tell me they had done something...!

LABEL: 0x7698
STRING: 「This is bad...」

LABEL: 0x76B4
STRING: 「Maybe Reiri and the others are――」

LABEL: 0x775B
STRING: 「Reiri?!」

LABEL: 0x777A
STRING: 「Whoa!」

LABEL: 0x77AE
STRING: ――Oh crap.

LABEL: 0x77CA
STRING: ――I shouldn't have mentioned her.

LABEL: 0x77F4
STRING: A sudden shock caused me to collapse on my back to the floor in the darkness.

LABEL: 0x7834
STRING: I fell face-up.

LABEL: 0x7856
STRING: There was a weight on my stomach.

LABEL: 0x78F3
STRING: 「Hey, are you saying Reiri's in danger?!」

LABEL: 0x7964
STRING: I was grabbed by the chest and choked lightly.

LABEL: 0x7990
STRING: Touri seemed to have straddled me.

LABEL: 0x79BE
STRING: Wait!

LABEL: 0x79DA
STRING: Calm down!

LABEL: 0x79F2
STRING: I tried to speak up, but with my neck being shaken, I couldn't open my mouth properly.

LABEL: 0x7A34
STRING: My arms were pinned down as well, and I couldn't move them freely.

LABEL: 0x7AE3
STRING: 「Hey!」

LABEL: 0x7B00
STRING: This... wasn't good...!

LABEL: 0x7B20
STRING: Right now, Touri had lost herself over Reiri.

LABEL: 0x7B54
STRING: She didn't know how to control her strength or make rational decisions.

LABEL: 0x7B96
STRING: We were in complete darkness, so the situation was dire.

LABEL: 0x7BD0
STRING: I had to calm her down somehow...

LABEL: 0x7C12
STRING: ――At that moment...

LABEL: 0x7C99
STRING: The lights turned back on.

LABEL: 0x7CBB
STRING: The panel next to the door soon returned to normal as well, displaying the floor count.

LABEL: 0x7D2B
STRING: Strength drained from Touri's arms all at once.

LABEL: 0x7D59
STRING: I took a deep breath as if this was my only chance to do so.

LABEL: 0x7E04
STRING: 「Katagiri-san, the lights are back on!」

LABEL: 0x7E35
STRING: 「I can see that, so just get off me for now...」

LABEL: 0x7E87
STRING: The elevator began to move.

LABEL: 0x7EAB
STRING: The door opened like nothing had happened as we reached the second floor.

LABEL: 0x7F64
STRING: 「Sorry about that...」

LABEL: 0x7F8F
STRING: 「No, don't worry about it.」

LABEL: 0x7FCB
STRING: If the malfunction had been sudden, so had the recovery.

LABEL: 0x8007
STRING: What the hell was that...?

LABEL: 0x802D
STRING: There was no point in thinking about it.

LABEL: 0x8053
STRING: I had to make sure everyone else was safe, too.

LABEL: 0x8152
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x817B
STRING: When we headed to the lobby on the second floor, Hiragino was just coming down the stairs.

LABEL: 0x81CD
STRING: He raised one hand in greeting as he noticed us.

LABEL: 0x81FF
STRING: For some reason, he was holding Tokiwa with his left hand.

LABEL: 0x8239
STRING: And was that Reiri staggering behind them?

LABEL: 0x8275
STRING: She didn't seem to be full of energy, but that was normal for her.

LABEL: 0x82C9
STRING: Next to me, Touri was relieved.

LABEL: 0x835D
STRING: 「Are you two all right?」

LABEL: 0x8392
STRING: 「Yeah, totally fine!」

LABEL: 0x8420
STRING: 「That's good to hear...」

LABEL: 0x8449
STRING: Hiragino showed concern for us, but his forehead was sweaty, and his breathing ragged.

LABEL: 0x848D
STRING: It looked like he'd been through a lot more than us.

LABEL: 0x84CB
STRING: 「What the hell was that all about?」

LABEL: 0x8561
STRING: 「Yeah, about that...」

LABEL: 0x85A4
STRING: Hiragino pointed to the pouting Tokiwa, who was restrained by one of his arms.

LABEL: 0x86B9
STRING: 「It was all their doing.」

LABEL: 0x86EA
STRING: Their... Did he mean Reiri was involved as well?

LABEL: 0x872C
STRING: The girl in question stood there, showing no concern at all.

LABEL: 0x87A0
STRING: Hiragino scratched his head in exasperation.

LABEL: 0x8897
STRING: 「The lights suddenly went out, so I was wondering what it was...」

LABEL: 0x88DA
STRING: 「Was there a blackout outside the elevator, too?」

LABEL: 0x8976
STRING: 「It was the whole front section.」

LABEL: 0x899B
STRING: 「That's pretty major...」

LABEL: 0x89D0
STRING: 「All the lights went out, and on top of that, I couldn't locate you two.」

LABEL: 0x8A18
STRING: 「So yeah, I've been looking all over.」

LABEL: 0x8A46
STRING: 「Running around all over the place...」

LABEL: 0x8AD1
STRING: 「Just when I thought I'd finally found you, would you believe it...!」

LABEL: 0x8B71
STRING: 「...I was found.」

LABEL: 0x8BA2
STRING: Tokiwa had a pouting expression.

LABEL: 0x8BD0
STRING: Are you a kid or something?!

LABEL: 0x8BE6
STRING: There was no sign of remorse at all.

LABEL: 0x8C46
STRING: ...This girl...

LABEL: 0x8C62
STRING: 「Why the hell would you do something like that...?」

LABEL: 0x8D06
STRING: 「Hide and seek in the dark.」

LABEL: 0x8D93
STRING: 「"Dark love," for short.」

LABEL: 0x8DBA
STRING: What did love have to do with it?

LABEL: 0x8E58
STRING: 「I did my best to get revenge for yesterday so that I wouldn't be killed by boredom.」

LABEL: 0x8EB4
STRING: 「However, Sousuke-san's relentless aggression made me surrender.」

LABEL: 0x8F59
STRING: 「...It's frustrating.」

LABEL: 0x8F7E
STRING: That's not what I asked you.

LABEL: 0x8FA4
STRING: 「That's not what I meant... If you're bored, why didn't you just tell us?」

LABEL: 0x8FE4
STRING: 「There's no need to cause chaos like this...」

LABEL: 0x9037
STRING: 「I did tell.」

LABEL: 0x90BE
STRING: 「I told Reiri-chan.」

LABEL: 0x90E1
STRING: 「Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x9115
STRING: She just had to choose her...

LABEL: 0x9137
STRING: No, was it a choice in the first place?

LABEL: 0x9169
STRING: She was close enough to Hiragino to call him by his first name, so why didn't she talk to him?

LABEL: 0x91C5
STRING: Tokiwa nodded with a puzzled expression.

LABEL: 0x925F
STRING: 「I told her that "I'm going to die of boredom."」

LABEL: 0x929F
STRING: 「Then, Reri-chan suggested something to me.」

LABEL: 0x9334
STRING: 「"I know an interesting game," she said.」

LABEL: 0x9367
STRING: 「In other words, it was Reiri's idea...」

LABEL: 0x93B7
STRING: Immediately, the question arose as to whether this could be dismissed as a mere "child's prank."

LABEL: 0x9411
STRING: Reiri had cracked the communications system and done some suspicious work in the lab.

LABEL: 0x9463
STRING: Would she turn off all the lights in the front section just to kill time?

LABEL: 0x94B3
STRING: There had to be some other purpose.

LABEL: 0x94DF
STRING: I had to question Reiri about what her true intentions were――

LABEL: 0x95D2
STRING: 「Is that true, Reiri?」

LABEL: 0x95F4
STRING: 「If you suddenly turn off the lights, everyone will be scared, right?」

LABEL: 0x96A8
STRING: 「Sorry, Nee-san.」

LABEL: 0x96CE
STRING: 「I'll be careful next time, okay?」

LABEL: 0x9703
STRING: 「Geez, that's what you always say――」

LABEL: 0x9742
STRING: Touri was scolding her.

LABEL: 0x9768
STRING: Touri put her hands on her hips and acted as the older sister, while Reiri honestly expressed her remorse.

LABEL: 0x97B4
STRING: From the sidelines, it looked like a charade.

LABEL: 0x9826
STRING: More importantly, I needed to question the purpose of this so-called dark love――

LABEL: 0x98E0
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x98FA
STRING: 「Are you guys injured or anything?」

LABEL: 0x992D
STRING: 「We were just trapped for a while, so there shouldn't be anything major.」

LABEL: 0x996D
STRING: 「If you're worried, you can examine us just in case.」

LABEL: 0x9A2F
STRING: 「...Well, it's fine.」

LABEL: 0x9A52
STRING: There was a strange silence.

LABEL: 0x9A6A
STRING: Hiragino glanced at me, frowned, and averted his eyes as if he had realized something.

LABEL: 0x9B32
STRING: 「Anyway, everyone, get some rest in your rooms.」

LABEL: 0x9B6B
STRING: Everyone dispersed at his command.

LABEL: 0x9C84
STRING: 「Let's go, Reiri.」

LABEL: 0x9CB1
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x9CCC
STRING: Touri took Reiri by the hand.

LABEL: 0x9CF6
STRING: In the end, I had no idea why Reiri had caused the blackout.

LABEL: 0x9D40
STRING: The sight of her obediently following her sister looked ominous.

LABEL: 0x9E7B
STRING: 「Ehhhh...」

LABEL: 0x9EA8
STRING: 「You're coming with me, Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x9ED7
STRING: Tokiwa immediately tried to wander off.

LABEL: 0x9F13
STRING: Hiragino grabbed her by the neck.

LABEL: 0x9F3F
STRING: ...I think he was getting the hang of handling her bit by bit.

LABEL: 0x9FEB
STRING: 「Come on, let's go.」

LABEL: 0xA018
STRING: 「Scaly-chan...」

LABEL: 0xA043
STRING: Was she still on about that?

LABEL: 0xA0D7
STRING: 「You need to get some rest too, Katagiri-kun.」

LABEL: 0xA114
STRING: 「I know...」

LABEL: 0xA166
STRING: And just as we were about to part ways...

LABEL: 0xA180
STRING: As we passed each other, Hiragino whispered into my ear with a solemn expression.

LABEL: 0xA22A
STRING: 「By the way...」

LABEL: 0xA257
STRING: 「Yes?」

LABEL: 0xA27C
STRING: 「Inside that pitch-black elevator...

LABEL: 0xA305
STRING: What were you two doing exactly?」

LABEL: 0xA33C
STRING: 「What?」

LABEL: 0xA3C0
STRING: 「Well, your clothes seem to be in disarray, so――」

LABEL: 0xA4AF
STRING: 「Gwah!」

LABEL: 0xA4C7
STRING: 「I'm against violence...」

LABEL: 0xA4EA
STRING: He sounded like a creep asking that.

LABEL: 0xA51A
STRING: I gave his solar plexus a good punch and headed to my room.
